  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14319</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">L'Europa in 12 lezioni</string>
            <string language="en">Europe in 12 lessons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europa in 12 Lektionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Europe dans 12 leçons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europa em 12 lições</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρώπη σε 12 μαθήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Europa en 12 lecciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un webquiz che usa il sito web dell'Europa in 12 lezioni per consolidare la conoscenza sulla fondazione e lo sviluppo della UE.</string>
            <string language="en">A webquiz using the Europe in 12 lessons website to consolidate knowledge about the founding and development of the EU.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein webquiz mit dem Europa in der Web site mit 12 
Lektionen, Wissen über die Gründung und die Entwicklung des EUS zu 
vereinigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un webquiz en utilisant l'Europe dans le site Web 
de 12 leçons pour consolider la connaissance au sujet de la fondation
et du développement de l'EU.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um webquiz usando a Europa em um Web site de 12 
lições consolidar o conhecimento sobre fundar e o desenvolvimento do
EU.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα webquiz που χρησιμοποιεί την Ευρώπη στον 
ιστοχώρο 12 μαθημάτων για να παγιώσει τη γνώση για την ίδρυση 
και την ανάπτυξη της ΕΕ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un webquiz usando la Europa en Web site de 12 
lecciones para consolidar conocimiento sobre la fundación y el 
desarrollo del EU.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
